name: WP Super Bar
author: Gasquez Florian

sections.description:
A very simple bar for outgoing links in your posts.

Features:

  • Feature a “DiggBar like” or “Facebook like” to all external links in your posts
  • Whitelist for links that you do not want to apply the WP Super Bar
  • Share your links easly with facebook, digg, twitter, etc…
  • You can easly edit WP Super Bar CSS from your WordPress Backend
  • You can customise text and logo.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Update the settings and design of your WP Super Bar going to Settings>WP Super Bar.

This plugin turn your links automaticly, to try just clic on outgoing link in your posts.
sections.changelog:
0.0.2

  • Fix UID bug
  • Stats in WP backend
  • Query corrections
  • Link to plugin page in WP backend

0.0.1

  • Initial public release
